#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main(){
   int t;
   cin>>t;
    for(int test=0;test<t;test++){
         char x[101],c;

         while(1){
             scanf("%s%c",x,&c);
        if(!strcmp(x,"8"))
          cout<<"ate ";
         else if(!strcmp(x,"b4"))
           cout<<"before ";
         else if(!strcmp(x,"w8"))
           cout<<"wait ";
          else if(!strcmp(x,"4"))
            cout<<"for ";
          else if(!strcmp(x,"gr8"))
            cout<<"great ";
          else
            printf("%s",x);
          if(c=='\n'){
              printf("\n");
             break;
          }
           else
             printf(" ");

      }
    }
    return 0;
}
